Text: Hi. Thank you for your awsome rips. Pls upload 1 blue ray copy in less than 4 gb which helps in transferring data from system to other storage devices

ashudils: you know you can format your storage device to a system (ntfs) that can transfer bigger files than 4 GB? Simply click on the start menu, computer and right click on the storage device and choose "format". Make sure it's empty or you'll loose everything you have on it.
